summary: Teleport Proxy and Teleport Agents: SSRF to arbitrary hosts is possible from low privileged users in github.com/gravitational/teleport
details:
Teleport Proxy and Teleport Agents: SSRF to arbitrary hosts is possible from low privileged users in github.com/gravitational/teleport.

NOTE: The source advisory for this report contains additional versions that could not be automatically mapped to standard Go module versions.

(If this is causing false-positive reports from vulnerability scanners, please suggest an edit to the report.)

The additional affected modules and versions are: github.com/gravitational/teleport before v12.4.31, from v13.0.0 before v13.4.13, from v14.0.0 before v14.2.4.
